property.name: CanBeDisabled
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Projectile can be disabled.

property.name: CanBePickedUp
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Projectile can be picked up.

property.name: CanPassThroughSmallTransparent
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Projectile can pass through small transparent objects.

property.name: CollisionLayer
property.summary: Gets or sets the Collision layer of this Projectile.

property.name: CollisionRadius
property.summary: Gets or sets the collision radius of this Projectile.

property.name: ConeSpread
property.summary: Gets or sets the spread of the effective cone caused by this Projectile.

property.name: DecalData
property.summary: Gets or sets the decal Texture of this Projectile.

property.name: DefaultWeaponSource
property.summary: Gets or sets the default weapon source of this Projectile.

property.name: DisableSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound which is played when this Projectile is disabled.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: ExplodesOnImpact
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the explosion caused by this Projectile is triggered on the impact.

property.name: Explosion
property.summary: Gets or sets the Explosion caused by this Projectile.

property.name: ExplosionCountdownSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound of the countdown timer that triggers the explosion of this Projectile.

property.name: ExplosionProximity
property.summary: Gets or sets the proximity which triggers the explosion of this Projectile.

property.name: ExplosionTimer
property.summary: Gets or sets the timer which triggers the explosion of this Projectile.

property.name: FadeDuration
property.summary: Gets or sets the beam fade duration of this Projectile.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: FullName
property.summary: Gets or sets the in-game name of this Projectile.

property.name: Gravity
property.summary: Gets or sets the gravitation pull applied on this Projectile.

property.name: HasMuzzleFlash
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Projectile causes a muzzle flash.

property.name: ImpactForce
property.summary: Gets or sets the force caused by the impact of this Projectile.

property.name: IsAutoAimEnabled
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the auto-aim is enabled for this Projectile.

property.name: IsExplosive
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Projectile is explosive.

property.name: IsHitScanEnabled
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the hit scan is enabled for this Projectile.

property.name: IsSupersonic
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the sound of this Projectile enamates from point on the trajectory that is the closest to the player character (true) or follows the Projectile until it is destroyed (false).

property.name: Lifetime
property.summary: Gets or sets the lifetime of this Projectile.

property.name: Light
property.summary: Gets or sets the Light caused by this Projectile.

property.name: MuzzleFlashDuration
property.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the muzzle flash caused by this Projectile.

property.name: MuzzleFlashLight
property.summary: Gets or sets the muzzle flash Light caused by this Projectile.

property.name: MuzzleFlashModel
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the model (.nif file) of the muzzle flash caused by this Projectile.

property.name: ObjectBounds
property.summary: Gets or sets the of this Projectile.

property.name: PinsLimbsOnCritical
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Projectile pins limbs when critical effect is triggered.

property.name: Range
property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum range this Projectile can travel.

property.name: RelaunchInterval
property.summary: Gets or sets the interval at which this Projectile can be launched again.

property.name: Sound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound caused by this Projectile.

property.name: SoundLevel
property.summary: Gets or sets the sound level of this Projectile in regards to detection.

property.name: Speed
property.summary: Gets or sets the travel speed of this Projectile.

property.name: TracerChance
property.summary: Gets or sets the chance a tracer will be drawn for this Projectile.

property.name: Type
property.summary: Gets or sets the type of this Projectile.

property.name: WorldModel
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the world model (.nif file) that will be used for this Projectile.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.
